func.title: FinishCommand

param.name: success
param.desc: Whether to evaluate the ended command as successful.

param.name: command_num
param.desc: Index of the command. 0 is the current command, other values indicate the following commands.

func.desc: Ends a command in the command stack of an object. A finished command stays in the stack until it would be time for it to be executed and is removed only then.
